title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competency: Web-Based Learning Module for Neonatal Skull Ultrasound Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental neonatal nursing and basic medical imaging knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners identify normal and abnormal structures in neonatal cranial ultrasound (CUS) images with 85% accuracy.
Based on CUS results, learners diagnose major lesions such as cerebral hemorrhage and ventricular dilation with 80% accuracy.
Learners can accurately map 3D ultrasound images to 2D cross-sectional views by utilizing mathematical spatial reasoning skills.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
